Subjects: evils of the times; sermons, verse in
_description: On the Evils of the Times — four lines

OxfMert248.Transcription:
Riȝtful dom is ouer cast& trouþe is fer
                    agonSoþnesse is ileyd a doun& riȝt nis þer
                    non
OxfMert248.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Historical Poems of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1959: 327.
